name: NSB WORLD BUSINESS SCHOOL
description:
NSB Bangalore, formerly National School of Business, is a new generation B-school with a global outlook. NSB recruits a diverse body of students from across India and abroad to create a cosmopolitan and truly multicultural learning environment.
 The program content is contemporary and facilitates action-led learning. NSB differentiates itself from the rest through quality and innovation, which are the pillars of our progress. Successful professionals from various fields with proven credentials and rich experience are part of this endeavor. NSB is fully committed to offer the best in every aspect of academics to give you a sound footing in management career.
features: Academic Partnership with top International B-Schools and Universities from Europe, Middle East & Southeast Asia
The only B-School where ALL interested students were sent to FREE Exchange Program to foreign partner universities.
Adventure Learning Program - that gives students the opportunity of experiential learning.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: “विद्यया विन्दतॆऽमृतम्”
ShortDescription: Widely considered one of the best postgraduate colleges in Bangalore, National School of Business has now been rebranded and rechristened as NSB Bangalore – Business School.
enhanced_description: NSB World Business School, formerly known as National School of Business and NSB Bangalore, is a postgraduate B-school established in 2004. Located in Bangalore, it aims to provide a sound footing in management careers by accelerating skill development and learning efficiency. The school boasts a global outlook, recruiting diverse students from India and abroad, and features contemporary, action-led learning content. Unique offerings include academic partnerships with top international B-schools and universities across Europe, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia, a distinctive free international exchange program for all interested students, and an Adventure Learning Program for experiential learning.
key_use_cases: Skill development for aspiring business professionals
Experiential learning for leadership and business acumen
Global exposure and cross-cultural business understanding
